DFA tool

Welcome to the homepage of the DFA tool.

Access the Risk Explorer at to add.

The DFA tool is an educational tool developed by the Insurance Development Forum in partnership with Oasis and Maximum Information.

The Risk Explorer is designed to …

This is a free and open-source tool, available under a BSD-3-Clause license. The code is available on the OasisLMF RiskExplorer GitHub repository.

The following sections of this user guide provide more general information, while the hazard-specific sections provide detailed methodology specific to those hazards.
